sentences.en: A bituminous material, such as asphalt, used to pave roads.
sentences.cn: 一种含沥青物质, 如沥青, 用于铺路.

sentences.en: At the whole active pyrolysis stage active energy than bituminous - coal, which was variance with pyrolysis reactivity.
sentences.cn: 煤的热解机制在不同的反应阶段是变化的,通过热分析手段所得的动力学参数反映的是整个热解区域的平均值.

sentences.en: Bituminous coal is often treated as a consistent and homogeneous product.
sentences.cn: 烟煤一般被视作一种质地均匀一致的产品.

sentences.en: Bituminous coal processing a lot of in - depth study.
sentences.cn: 对煤沥青加工方面有很多的深入研究.

sentences.en: Bituminous crude oil : Refers to crude oil extracted from bituminous minerals.
sentences.cn: 三沥青矿原油: 指自沥青质矿物提出之原油.

sentences.en: Bituminous pavement on concrete bridge is of a complex applied loads give rise to stress response.
sentences.cn: 混凝土桥面的沥青铺装层在外部荷载作用下的应力比较复杂,高温稳定性是铺装层材料的一项重要指标.

sentences.en: General bituminous coal mining; Motor freight.
sentences.cn: 一般烟煤开采; 汽车货运.

sentences.en: In 1969 a ( 51 mm ) bituminous concrete overlay was placed on the concrete deck.
sentences.cn: 1969年在混凝土板上铺设了51mm厚的沥青混凝土铺装层.

sentences.en: JTJ 052 - 2000 , Standard Test Methods of Bitumen and Bituminous Mixtures for Highway Engineering [ S ].
sentences.cn: 公路工程沥青及沥青混合料试验规程 [ S ].

sentences.en: Macroscopic classification for bituminous coal is one of the research tasks for coal petrology.
sentences.cn: 烟煤的宏观煤岩分类是煤岩学研究的内容之一.

sentences.en: Of all the workers in the country bituminous miners probably had best grounds for discontent.
sentences.cn: 在全国所有的工人中,可能烟煤矿工不满的理由最充分.

sentences.en: Oil: Refers to petroleum crude oil, bituminous crude oil, and petroleum products.
sentences.cn: 一石油: 指石油原油 、 沥青矿原油及石油制品.

sentences.en: Safety regulations for the explosion precautions of bituminous coal injection into blast furnace.
sentences.cn: 高炉喷吹烟煤系统防爆安全规程.

sentences.en: Stable size and good filter efficiency of the bituminous.
sentences.cn: 尺寸稳定,沥青浸渍性好.

sentences.en: Thermal crack is a usual disease of bituminous pavement in the north and middle of China.
sentences.cn: 在我国北方和中部地区,低温开裂是沥青路面最常见的一种病害.
